item.title: Ghastly Tales
item.description:
打包下载📦仍在工事中

Ghastly Tales

Superstar writer Marguerite Bennett (A-Force, Bombshells) shows us her darker side with this trio of terrifyingly twisted tales illustrated by breakout talent, Varga Tomi. An Alaskan ranger, a maiden scorned, a family of bootleggers; all cling desperately to the things in life they hold dear… and woe is the fate of those who mean it harm.

item.title: Broken Frontier Anthology
item.description:
打包下载📦仍在工事中

Broken Frontier: Anthology

The Broken Frontier Anthology unites 50 of the most innovative talents in contemporary comics to share new visions of breaking boundaries and exploring the great unknown. From multiple award winners to the brightest up-and-coming voices, these creators have come together from all over the world to bring you 27 amazing stories about time travel, dystopian deserts, the edges of the universe, human mortality, and much much more!

SAFE

How far would you go to keep your family SAFE? A bold and subversive graphic novel take on the zombie genre in breathtaking color!

item.title: American Terrorist
item.description:
打包下载📦仍在工事中

American Terrorist

A war has been waged against the American people. It’s a covert war, one that those in power hope will go unnoticed, but day by day, jobs, homes, pensions and civil liberties are taken away while the gap between the haves and the have-nots grows wider. With no way out, four activists become fugitives of the law and go on the offensive against corruption and injustice. They share their story with the nation using social media to inspire their followers to rise up and reclaim their country.

item.title: Poison the Cure
item.description:
打包下载📦仍在工事中

Poison the Cure

Three explorers find a planet littered with the remnants of old civilization. They peer into the past. Three explorers find a planet littered with the remnants of old civilization. They peer into the past. One story connects them. This is Poison the Cure. Now the multi-part graphic-novel series hailed by critics, creators, and fans is for the first time released in digital format. Called “cruel,” “hilarious,” “stunning,” and “beautiful” by Pulitzer Prize winner Junot Diaz, this is the story of a group of companions faced with a fatal accident, an inescapable decision, and a stark, brutal world.
